id: scenario-value-scanner-idd-community-scenarios-workplace-organizational-participating in staff meetings as equal colleague
did: did:web:elohim.host:content:value-scanner:idd-community:scenarios:workplace-organizational-participating in staff meetings as equal colleague
title: Participating in staff meetings as equal colleague
description: Participating in staff meetings as equal colleague
content:
Scenario: Participating in staff meetings as equal colleague
    Given the library holds monthly staff meetings
    And all employees should participate in workplace decisions
    When Jordan attends the staff meeting
    Then the personal_agent helps Jordan prepare for participation
    And meeting facilitators use accessible communication practices
    And Jordan can share ideas and concerns
    And Jordan's input is valued alongside other staff members
    And workplace decisions consider Jordan's perspective
    And Jordan experiences being a respected colleague, not just a client
